queries: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS aws_certifications;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aws_certifications.users (user_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,country VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aws_certifications.certifications (certification_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,level VARCHAR(50),category VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aws_certifications.certifications_awarded (awarded_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,user_id INT NOT NULL,certification_id INT NOT NULL,awarded_date DATE NOT NULL,FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES aws_certifications.users(user_id),FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES aws_certifications.certifications(certification_id));

INSERT INTO aws_certifications.users (name, email, country) VALUES('Alice Johnson', 'alice@example.com', 'USA'),('Bob Smith', 'bob@example.com', 'Canada'),('Charlie Davis', 'charlie@example.com', 'UK'),('David Brown', 'david@example.com', 'Germany'),('Emma Wilson', 'emma@example.com', 'France'),('Frank Moore', 'frank@example.com', 'Australia'),('Grace White', 'grace@example.com', 'India'),('Henry Taylor', 'henry@example.com', 'Brazil'),('Ivy Clark', 'ivy@example.com', 'Mexico'),('Jack Adams', 'jack@example.com', 'Japan');

INSERT INTO aws_certifications.certifications (certification_name, level, category) VALUES('AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner', 'Foundational', 'Cloud'),('AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate', 'Associate', 'Architecture'),('AWS Certified Developer – Associate', 'Associate', 'Development'),('AWS Certified SysOps Administrator – Associate', 'Associate', 'Operations'),('AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional', 'Professional', 'Architecture'),('AWS Certified DevOps Engineer – Professional', 'Professional', 'DevOps'),('AWS Certified Security – Specialty', 'Specialty', 'Security'),('AWS Certified Database – Specialty', 'Specialty', 'Database'),('AWS Certified Data Analytics – Specialty', 'Specialty', 'Analytics'),('AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty', 'Specialty', 'ML');

SELECT u.name, u.email, u.country, c.certification_name, c.level, c.category, ca.awarded_date FROM aws_certifications.certifications_awarded ca JOIN aws_certifications.users u ON ca.user_id = u.user_id JOIN aws_certifications.certifications c ON ca.certification_id = c.certification_id ORDER BY ca.awarded_date DESC;
